Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Establishes a giving internships for disabled veterans not fully employed program (G.I.V.E. Back NY)
Summary: Establishes a veterans internship program (V.I.P. NY); awards ten percent of available internships in the assembly youth participation program and the senate student program to eligible honorably discharged veterans.
LawCode: Add Art 6-B ยง97, Leg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to establishing a veterans internship program (V.I.P. NY)
